summary: An Ordinance relating to, and providing for, the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of Forty-fifth Avenue South, from Brandon Street to Bennett Street, and of Bennett Street from Forty-fifth Avenue South to the West line of Tract Seventeen (17), of Columbia Heights, an addition to the City of Seattle, as provided in Ordinance No. 45594 of the City of Seattle, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
